sentences.en: At the sink, Neil noisily gargled something medicinal.
sentences.cn: 尼尔在洗脸池边用某种药液咕噜咕噜地漱口。

sentences.en: Clearing one's conscience is medicinal for the soul.
Garlic is believed to have medicinal properties (= contain things that can cure medical problems ) .
sentences.cn: 大蒜被认为具有药用功效。

sentences.en: He also had an invincible faith in the medicinal virtues of garlic.
sentences.cn: 他同时也对大蒜的医学功效深信不疑。

sentences.en: He is studying the medicinal properties of wild plants.
sentences.cn: 他正在研究野生植物的药物特性.

sentences.en: He kept a little brandy for medicinal purposes.
sentences.cn: 他留了点白兰地作药用.

sentences.en: Her interest was rekindled when she saw herbs in everyday medicinal use there.
sentences.cn: 在那里看到日常医疗中广泛使用草药的时候，她的兴趣被重新点燃了。

sentences.en: She often dococts the medicinal herbs for her mother.
The hospital room had a medicinal smell.
sentences.cn: 医院病房里有一股药味.

sentences.en: These medicinal herbs are said to act on the liver.
sentences.cn: 据说这些草药对肝脏有用.
这些植物具有药物效用.

sentences.en: They removed royal jelly for medicinal use.
sentences.cn: 他们把蜂王浆取出用作药品.

sentences.en: This medicinal herb is hard to come by.
This plant has long been known for its medicinal qualities.
sentences.cn: 这种植物一直以其药性而闻名。

sentences.en: Treatment with medicinal herb is attended with good results.

words.tran_cn: 有药效的；可治病的；有治疗作用的
药物；药物治疗；药物处理

trans.tran_cn: 医学的，医药的，药用的，治疗的，医疗的，粟砂
